content.name: Sawamura House
content.description: This is the house where Maya, Kent and Lisa live. It is a rented house and the landlord is Haraboji.

content.name: Pongle Bongle Store
content.description: This is a convenience store and home of Haraboji. It is owned by Haraboji.

content.name: Tower "The Metaverse Bridge"
content.description: This is a building that houses various devices and computers that connect several different metaverse through "Multi-Verse Connect Engine". The location of this building is said to be underground or on a remote island, but this information is not publicly available.

content.name: Multi-Metaverse Council Headquarters Hall
content.description: This is the headquarters and meeting hall of Multi-Metaverse Council. Once a month, council members from all over the world gather here for plenary sessions.

content.name: Nag-Won
content.headline: A Next-Generation Metaverse
content.description: A next-generation metaverse developed by NMI, a VR device development company, and recently opened to the public. It provides users with a five-sense experience comparable to the real world, which is not possible in a conventional metaverse. In Chinese characters, it is called "楽園" (Paradise).

content.name: Ovi-Wan
content.headline: A Pub in Metaverse "Nag-Won".
content.description: This is a pub in the metaverse "Nag-Won". This is where the Sawamura family and Unchained caused a ruckus.
content.note: "Ovi-Wan" is written in Chinese characters as "澳比湾".
